query: SELECT column_name, column_type, is_nullable, column_key FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' AND column_name = 'subdomain';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user VqBKoEwKfw4feq4.6cd8cd1ff95f --database aavW9BLbZ6sZHaPEemayyD --execute SELECT column_name, column_type, is_nullable, column_key FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' AND column_name = 'subdomain';
stdout:
column_name	column_type	is_nullable	column_key
subdomain	varchar(63)	YES	UNI
